Join the essential dialogue on AI's impact on federal statistics during the **AI Day for Federal Statistics**. This event, taking place on May 2, 2024, at the National Academy of Sciences Building in Washington DC, promises explorative discussions on AI applications, challenges, and practical tools for enhancing federal operations.

Federal agencies will showcase their AI experiences through poster sessions, addressing methodological approaches, privacy concerns, and lessons learned.

Don't miss this opportunity to contribute to the future of federal statistical methods informed by AI.

[Learn more and register for the event.](https://www.nationalacademies.org/event/42319_05-2024_ai-day-for-federal-statistics-cnstat-public-event)

**Event Details:**
Date: May 2, 2024  
Time: 10:00AM - 5:30PM ET  
Location: National Academy of Sciences Building, Washington DC  
Contact: [Madeleine Goedicke](mailto:mgoedicke@nas.edu)
